nodes.text: The Gleaming Fortunes Casino was a casino located on Coruscant. In 43.5 ABY, the Senator of Kuat, Haydnat Treen, met with Imperial Moff Drikl Lecersen, Galactic Alliance General Merratt Jaxton, and the Senator of Coruscant, Fost Bramsin, to play a game of Chambers and conspire to overthrow Alliance Chief of State Natasi Daala.
